biotools.summary: Web server that performs integrated text mining for insect biology, covering diverse aspects from molecular interactions of genes to insect behavior. It recognizes a number of entities and relations in Medline documents about the model insect, Drosophila melanogaster.

bioschemas.name: BSQA
